messages.content: 9-1-1, what's your emergency?
Counselor, no one here.
Yes, sir.
Comey's Middle School, we have a student with a gun.
Can you help us out, please?
We'll call the local police also.
You're closest to us.
Call us Middle School, Mr. Patrick.
Pardon me? You said there's a student with a gun at the school?
Yes, he's at the entrance of the school.
What is he wearing?
Uh, he is wearing...
Make sure you secure the entrance of the school.
This is the assistant principal at Comey's Middle School.
Okay, and what is the student wearing, ma'am?
Red over jeans, red shirt, and he's busy.
Red over jeans?
Uh-huh. Kind of general school attire, but he's got a gun.
Did he point the gun at anybody?
Yes, he's got it right here on school property.
Okay, thank you, ma'am.
At the entrance of the school, in the hallway, if you walk into the school where the flags are, inside the hallway.
So he's inside the school right now?
Yes, as you walk in.
I am listening. I'm also talking to a colleague.
We're calling you because you're closer.
He's inside the school, walking towards some flags?
Yes, he has a gun in his clutch.
Is the school on lockdown, ma'am?
Yes, we are in lockdown.
Okay, hold on the phone.
I'm in the front office.
Front office? And you can open the window to flag us?
Yes.
Can I have your name again?
Petro. H-A-T-C-H-E-R.
As you walk in, you can see me by the window near the flags.
But don't rush in; he still has a gun.
What color is the gun?
It's dark, black.
Where is he right now?
At the entrance of the school, same place.
Okay, I'll notify the officers not to charge the front door.
Police are here already, but please don't come in.
So there is an officer there?
Yes, but don't come in. He has a gun.
Alright, I've got units aware. Police are here.
There's a child with a gun. Tell other parents too.
Who are you talking to, ma'am?
Get out of the way!
Ma'am, who?
He's drawing the gun.
Okay, put it down.
He's drawing the gun.
Put it down now.
He's drawing the gun.
Put it on the floor.
Should I stay on the phone now?
Put it down on the floor.
He's drawing the gun. Be careful.
Ma'am?
He's got the gun.
Lock the door.
She's saying she's willing to die. Be careful.
Lock the door.
He's at the entrance of the school.
Ma'am, I need everyone to leave the front office now.
Can I hang up?
Yes, lock the door.
Police are out there, but he has the gun in the hallway.
I understand, we're sending officers.
6779, they're shooting!
Ma'am, I need you to leave the building already.
He's going to fire!
